Examples

Examples

Spherical Errors

vcov(model, :OLS)
3×3 Array{Float64,2}:
  0.016813   -0.0137853   -0.015506
 -0.0137853   0.0239814    0.00324634
 -0.015506    0.00324634   0.0280499

HC1

 -0.01399     0.0250724    0.00366193
 -0.0157613   0.00366193   0.0259826

Cluster Robust Variance Covariance Estimators (multi-way clustering)

VarianceCovarianceEstimators.clusters(obj::MyModel) = groups

CRVE1

V, rdf = vcov(model, :HC1)
V
3×3 Array{Float64,2}:
 0.00911633   0.00552404   0.00316669
 0.00552404   0.0143093   -0.0170055
 0.00316669  -0.0170055    0.00115659
